content:
EDIT: I managed. I just needed to install mathlibtools

Hi! I am trying to install lean 3.4.2 in order to use mathport on one of my projects.
Unfortunately, I am unsure how to install lean4 and lean 3.4.2 in my system.
I have a Mac OS with an m1 chip and a Ubuntu system with x86 arch, so instructions for either are fine.
Valentina Trucco Dalmas (Tina) has marked this topic as resolved.
